cello.alt.servlet.scripting
Class AbstractJavaScript

java.lang.Object
  cello.alt.servlet.scripting.AbstractJavaScript
All Implemented Interfaces:
JavaScript
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileScript, JarScriptLoader.JarScript
public abstract class AbstractJavaScript
extends java.lang.Object
implements JavaScript

This AbstractJavaScript class a useful basis for creating cached JavaScript classes. It implements all the necessary dependency loading/updating and only requires two methods to be implemented (isModified and evaluate).

Author:
Marcello

compile

protected abstract org.mozilla.javascript.Script compile(org.mozilla.javascript.Context cx)
                                                  throws java.io.IOException
Compile and return the current script for use by evaluate(). This method can return null if there is no actual Script (only dependencies).

the compiled script

addDependency

public void addDependency(JavaScript dependency,
                          boolean cascadeReload)
Adds this script as a dependency of this object. The dependency can be added as a "cascade" dependency. When a cascade dependency is modified, the current script is also reevaluated (even if it is not modified).

Specified by:
addDependency in interface JavaScript
Parameters:
dependency - the JavaScript you depend on
cascadeReload - whether or not to cascade the reload

checkDependencies

protected boolean checkDependencies(org.mozilla.javascript.Context cx,
                                    GlobalScope global)
                             throws java.io.IOException
Checks dependencies and loads them as needed, returning true if any of the cascading dependecies were reloaded (thus requiring the current script to reload).

Parameters:
cx - javascript Context
global - javascript Scope
Returns:
true if a cascading dependency was loaded
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was a problem loading something

resetDependencies

protected void resetDependencies()
Stores the current list of parents for use with synchronizeParents()
